name: A Letter Arrives
description: Your letters to %PERSON_NAME speak of dark terrors, and constant threats of betrayal and corruption. You fill their mind with fears and suspicions, working to turn them against their fellow nobles.

choices.name: Continue to drive towards madness
choices.description:
Slowly convinces %PERSON_NAME that the entire world is against them, and that all human societies are filled with agents of the shadow, poised to strike and destroy the world.

-75% chance to cause %PERSON_NAME to lose 3 points of sanity

outcomes.description: %PERSON_NAME's fears continue to grow. %He sleeps with a dagger under %her pillow and only eats food %he's seen cooked in front of %him. The strain eats at %his sanity. The work continues...
Nothing seems to be taking root so far, you will need to change your approach slightly. Maybe next time you'll have better luck. The efforts continue...

choices.name: Feed off the stream of terror
choices.description: %PERSON_NAME's fears are a dark vortex, a whirlpool of dark emotions from which power can be drawn. Take power from that fear, granting you +2 dark power.

outcomes.description: You gain +2 power. The work continues...

choices.name: Reveal terrible secrets
choices.description:
Start sharing some of the forbidden secrets which humanity was not meant to know with %PERSON_NAME, perhaps breaking their mind, but also risking exposing your enthralled.

-50% chance to drain 5 points of sanity

-10% chance to gain 10% evidence on your enthralled

-10% chance to cause %PERSON_NAME to gain suspicion towards %ENTHRALLED_NAME

-30% chance to accomplish nothing yet

outcomes.description: %PERSON_NAME slowly descends into lunacy, as they howl at servants and peasants they view as spies, and go nights without sleep, haunted by the descriptions of madness you have sent them. The efforts continue...

%ENTHRALLED_NAME has grossly overstepped, and under-estimated %PERSON_NAME's tendency to share all secrets they hear with everyone they meet. Some evidence of dark deeds may need hiding (%ENTHRALLED_NAME gains evidence). The efforts continue...
%ENTHRALLED_NAME has gone too far, and revealed themselves too early. %PERSON_NAME gains suspicion towards them. The efforts continue...
Nothing seems to be taking root so far, you will need to change your approach slightly. Maybe next time you'll have better luck. The efforts continue...

choices.name: Enough of this distraction
choices.description: Ends this event chain, abandoning your efforst to influence the mind of %PERSON_NAME
